clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Flaxseed Flour in Appetite Sensations, Lipid Profile and Pressure Levels Among Overweighed and Obese Women
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Flaxseed Flour - Whole Brown Flaxseed Flour, Brown Defatted Flaxseed Flour and Golden Flaxseed Flour in Appetite Sensations Satiety, Lipid Profile, Pressure Levels and Associated Costs Among Overweighed and Obese Women

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

collaborator.agency: Rio de Janeiro State Research Supporting Foundation (FAPERJ)
Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico

clinical_study.source: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

brief_summary.textblock: Inclusion of foods rich in fiber, such as flaxseed, is a nutritional strategy for treating obesity. The hypothesis of this study is to compare the effects of three types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour, brown defatted flaxseed flour and golden flaxseed flour in the sensations of appetite and satiety, lipid profile, pressure levels and associated costs in overweight and obese women.

primary_outcome.description: Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF), and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in subjective sensations of appetite in overweighed and obese women.

secondary_outcome.description: Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF), and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in subjective sensations of satiety in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

Compare the effects of three different types of flaxseed flour - whole brown flaxseed flour (WBFF), brown defatted flaxseed flour (BDFF) and golden flaxseed flour (GFF) - in reducing cardiovascular risk factors in overweighed and obese women.

arm_group.description: 30 grams per day of defatted flaxseed flour
30 grams per day of golden flaxseed flour
30 grams per day of whole brown flaxseed flour

intervention.description: 30g defatted flaxseed flour per day for breakfast
30 grams of golden flaxseed flour per day for breakfast
30 grams of whole brown flaxseed flour per day for breakfast

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- adult women
Exclusion Criteria:
- women diabetic
- menopausal
- smokers
- pregnant
- using anorectic and satiogenic drugs

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro
